
本樓層位於 PF (ETABS 樓層)，高於強柱弱梁設定之最高樓層 (R1F)，未考慮韌性設計，故無輸出計算書。

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 45.91 (t-m)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 21.65 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 31.43 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -30.69 T
Mu,maj = -15.32 T-M
Mu,min = 3.66 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -17.09 T
Mu,maj = -6.01 T-M
Mu,min = -21.65 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = 55.46 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = 55.46 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 24.78 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 32.63 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 33.43 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 36.70 (t)
Vp           = 36.70 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -21.08 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      36.70 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.159 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.204 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

| Maj.Av/S=  0.371<15-4>[C1]      |                |   Y- 5( 0)              |
|            0.159<Mpr>[C1]       |                |   Hoop: 1-#4            |
| Min.Av/S=  0.371<15-4>[C1]      |                |   Ties: 2-#4 @ 10 - 15  |
|            0.204<Mpr>[C1]       +----------------+         2-#4            |

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

Vp      =      83.93 T
hc      =      70.73 cm

Avh / S =      0.191 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(103.58, 127.00, 380.00) = 103.58 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (103.58 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.86 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.57 cm2)

  R1F GB8(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm

  ASB = 3-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 73.01 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 55.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 59.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 40.38 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)

  ASB = 3-#8

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 55.46 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 40.38 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 45.91 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 66.97 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 59.79 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -34.99 T
Mu,maj = 12.94 T-M
Mu,min = 16.59 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -42.89 T
Mu,maj = 20.80 T-M
Mu,min = 66.97 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = 128.46 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = 110.91 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 72.87 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 65.16 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 83.89 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 73.36 (t)
Vp           = 83.89 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      39.15 T (COMB3 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      83.89 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.363 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.191 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(123.75, 247.00, 705.00) = 123.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (123.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.46 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.64 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.46
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 29.12 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 47.86 (t-m)

Mu,min = -29.12 T-M

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = 55.45 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = 73.01 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.46
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 33.39 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 49.22 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 37.02 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 50.93 (t)
Vp           = 50.93 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -42.02 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      50.93 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.220 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.472 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.472 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 116.98 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 125.48 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 116.32 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 133.15 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 97.21 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 107.76 (t)
Vp           = 107.76 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 80.96 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 89.52 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -70.98 T
Mu,maj = -21.04 T-M
Mu,min = 3.25 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 0.00 T
Mu,maj = 3.85 T-M
Mu,min = 80.96 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.90 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 84.77 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 86.93 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 95.07 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 67.85 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 74.93 (t)
Vp           = 74.93 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -28.16 T (COMB25 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      74.93 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.285 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.286 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(143.25, 247.00, 705.00) = 143.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (143.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 7.01 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.67 cm2)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 53.06 (t-m)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (123.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.46 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.64 cm2)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 62.16 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 89.49 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 80.93 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -71.12 T
Mu,maj = 21.03 T-M
Mu,min = 3.25 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -129.94 T
Mu,maj = 2.67 T-M
Mu,min = 89.49 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 84.80 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 75.93 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 95.03 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 86.90 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 74.93 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 67.84 (t)
Vp           = 74.93 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      47.31 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      74.93 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.285 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.286 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_clock    = 60.31 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = 40.91 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.44
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 62.34 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 39.83 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 51.10 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 33.64 (t)
Vp           = 51.10 (t)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(123.75, 247.00, 705.00) = 123.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (123.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.46 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.64 cm2)

  R1F GB6(55x80)

  ASB = 3-#8

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 40.38 (t-m)

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(123.75, 247.00, 705.00) = 123.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.46
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 47.80 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 29.08 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = 39.67 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = 30.13 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.46
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 49.16 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 33.35 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 37.01 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 26.45 (t)
Vp           = 37.01 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      41.55 T (COMB3 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      37.01 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.180 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.472 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.472 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  11F GB7(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 4-#8 + 2.21(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 3-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 55.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 73.01 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 40.37 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 58.60 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  10F GB7(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 5-#8 + 2.21(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 4-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 73.03 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 90.44 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 53.06 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 71.20 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 23.38 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 33.93 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 32.94 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 44.21 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -56.27 T
Mu,maj = -11.61 T-M
Mu,min = 1.49 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -18.14 T
Mu,maj = 1.25 T-M
Mu,min = -23.38 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 26.76 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 35.23 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 37.79 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 46.80 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 26.89 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 34.18 (t)
Vp           = 34.18 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -23.43 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      34.18 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.148 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.195 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(10) 柱設計及配筋完成
======================================================================================================================================================
(COL. LINE : C1)

|            0.195<Mpr>[C1]       +----------------+         2-#4            |

      kg-cm for else

Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 80.51 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 88.36 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 74.48 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 83.29 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 88.67 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 97.08 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 67.98 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 75.15 (t)
Vp           = 75.15 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -39.82 T (COMB45 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      75.15 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制

(minor)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(103.58, 127.00, 380.00) = 103.58 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (103.58 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.86 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.57 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  11F GB8(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 6-#8 + 2.57(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 5-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 107.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 90.53 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 84.67 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 65.73 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 76.72 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 68.49 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 88.16 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 80.32 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -79.70 T
Mu,maj = 10.83 T-M
Mu,min = 15.10 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -87.69 T
Mu,maj = -16.24 T-M
Mu,min = -76.72 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 83.47 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 74.64 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 96.86 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 88.47 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 75.14 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 67.96 (t)
Vp           = 75.14 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      39.81 T (COMB43 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      75.14 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.325 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.240 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.08, 127.00, 200.00) = 102.08 cm

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

Y 方向 柱頂
  11F GB11(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 6-#8 + 2.52(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 5-#8

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 107.81 (t-m)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 84.54 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.08, 127.00, 200.00) = 102.08 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.08 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.74 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.49 cm2)

  10F GB10(55x80)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 87.79 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 95.17 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 108.03 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 115.77 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -80.60 T
Mu,maj = -23.43 T-M
Mu,min = -6.54 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -43.17 T
Mu,maj = 115.77 T-M
Mu,min = -12.51 T-M
As     = 81.15 cm2

As,req = 81.15 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 35.56 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 52.42 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 46.47 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 72.73 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 34.18 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 52.14 (t)
Vp           = 52.14 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -29.88 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      52.14 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.225 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.421 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.421 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(123.75, 247.00, 705.00) = 123.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (123.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.46 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.64 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  11F GB4(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 5-#8 + 3.64(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 4-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 90.44 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 73.03 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 74.75 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 53.07 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 83.91 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 92.78 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 99.85 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 108.79 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -136.60 T
Mu,maj = -18.87 T-M
Mu,min = 0.96 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -55.76 T
Mu,maj = 1.01 T-M
Mu,min = -83.91 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 90.09 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 98.53 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 108.41 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 116.87 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 82.71 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 89.75 (t)
Vp           = 89.75 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      34.64 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      89.75 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.341 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.342 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 121.97 (t)

柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(3) 柱主筋彈性設計結果
======================================================================================================================================================

         Bottom         -137.60           19.13           15.91            0.77            1.21

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================

T 型梁內版筋總量 = (143.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 7.01 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.67 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 93.03 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.13 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 108.50 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 99.59 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -137.60 T
Mu,maj = 19.13 T-M
Mu,min = 0.77 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -184.74 T
Mu,maj = -5.20 T-M
Mu,min = -93.03 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 98.79 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 90.33 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 116.57 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 108.13 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 89.73 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 82.69 (t)
Vp           = 89.73 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      55.77 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      89.73 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.341 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.342 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.08, 127.00, 200.00) = 102.08 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

Y 方向 柱頂
  11F GB19(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 6-#8 + 2.49(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 6-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 107.92 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 107.92 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 84.53 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 78.35 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 200.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 87.91 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 95.30 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 107.89 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 115.62 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -80.21 T
Mu,maj = 23.19 T-M
Mu,min = -6.51 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -42.96 T
Mu,maj = 115.62 T-M
Mu,min = 12.40 T-M
As     = 81.06 cm2

As,req = 81.06 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 52.49 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 35.61 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 72.64 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 46.41 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 52.14 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 34.17 (t)
Vp           = 52.14 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      34.38 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      52.14 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.225 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.420 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.420 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 90.44 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 53.06 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 71.20 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  9F GB7(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 7-#8 + 2.21(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 6-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 108.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 125.70 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 78.73 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 96.76 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 32.34 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 43.40 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 46.49 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 57.13 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -81.50 T
Mu,maj = -12.06 T-M
Mu,min = 1.61 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -18.22 T
Mu,maj = 0.95 T-M
Mu,min = -32.34 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 37.09 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 45.94 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 53.36 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 61.85 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 37.69 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 44.91 (t)
Vp           = 44.91 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -14.45 T (COMB22 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      44.91 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.194 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.241 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 86.20 (t)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 91.35 (t-m)

考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  9F GB9(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 6-#8 + 2.21(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 6-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 108.40 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 108.40 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 78.73 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 84.20 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 92.88 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.63 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 109.98 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 102.19 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -124.90 T
Mu,maj = 11.22 T-M
Mu,min = 15.84 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -53.02 T
Mu,maj = 14.36 T-M
Mu,min = 109.98 T-M
As     = 73.93 cm2

As,req = 73.93 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 102.05 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 93.21 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 121.97 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 113.65 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 93.34 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 86.19 (t)
Vp           = 93.34 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      46.97 T (COMB75 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      93.34 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.403 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.403 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.287 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 105.76 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 113.33 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 127.82 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 127.85 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -116.20 T
Mu,maj = -24.68 T-M
Mu,min = -6.81 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -62.23 T
Mu,maj = 127.85 T-M
Mu,min = -13.24 T-M
As     = 87.61 cm2

As,req = 87.61 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 45.49 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 71.20 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 62.71 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 88.04 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 45.08 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 66.35 (t)
Vp           = 66.35 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -18.80 T (COMB62 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      66.35 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.287 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)

X 方向 柱底
  9F GB5(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 10-#8 + 4.67(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 143.39 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 177.32 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 103.99 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 140.27 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 99.15 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 108.03 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 122.91 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 139.31 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -202.37 T
Mu,maj = -19.17 T-M
Mu,min = 1.26 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -117.18 T
Mu,maj = -2.43 T-M
Mu,min = -99.15 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 107.66 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 116.06 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 134.94 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 151.95 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 101.08 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 111.67 (t)
Vp           = 111.67 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      45.27 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     111.67 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

  AST = 10-#8 + 4.67(only for Mnb) cm2

  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 177.32 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 143.39 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 140.27 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 103.99 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(123.75, 247.00, 705.00) = 123.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (123.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.46 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.64 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  9F GB6(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 7-#8 + 3.64(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 7-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 125.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 125.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 91.34 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 100.34 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 108.06 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 99.18 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 139.28 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 122.88 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -204.25 T
Mu,maj = 19.42 T-M
Mu,min = 1.17 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -245.72 T
Mu,maj = -3.68 T-M
Mu,min = -108.06 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 116.09 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 107.69 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 151.91 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 134.90 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 111.66 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 101.08 (t)
Vp           = 111.66 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      63.06 T (COMB75 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     111.66 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.425 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 105.80 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 113.37 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 127.77 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 127.80 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -115.63 T
Mu,maj = 24.41 T-M
Mu,min = -6.79 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -61.83 T
Mu,maj = 127.77 T-M
Mu,min = 13.54 T-M
As     = 87.66 cm2

As,req = 87.66 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 71.23 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 45.51 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 88.01 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 62.68 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 66.35 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 45.08 (t)
Vp           = 66.35 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      42.88 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      66.35 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.287 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 53.85 (t-m)

Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 48.85 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 56.01 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      19.23 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      56.01 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.242 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.289 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm

T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 109.88 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 118.26 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 115.26 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 122.92 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -171.87 T
Mu,maj = -10.52 T-M
Mu,min = 16.66 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -75.60 T
Mu,maj = 15.18 T-M
Mu,min = 115.26 T-M
As     = 71.91 cm2

As,req = 71.91 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 122.20 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 131.14 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 128.76 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 136.91 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 104.57 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 111.69 (t)
Vp           = 111.69 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      50.02 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     111.69 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.349 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      56.76 T (COMB75 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     111.68 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.483 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.348 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 200.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  9F GB20(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 8-#8 + 2.52(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 143.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 143.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 110.12 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 103.92 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)


Y 方向 柱底
  8F GB20(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 10-#8 + 2.52(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 177.64 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 160.69 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 135.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 116.55 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 65.64 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 61.95 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 81.61 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 70.38 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -106.76 T
Mu,maj = 12.50 T-M
Mu,min = 4.36 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 20.83 T
Mu,maj = 81.61 T-M
Mu,min = 10.22 T-M
As     = 67.57 cm2

As,req = 67.57 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 62.44 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 53.87 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 71.98 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 63.36 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 56.01 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 48.84 (t)
Vp           = 56.01 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      33.15 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      56.01 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.242 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.289 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
