(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 163.04 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 182.40 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 174.83 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 185.82 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -352.64 T
Mu,maj = -25.05 T-M
Mu,min = -7.80 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -288.85 T
Mu,maj = 4.03 T-M
Mu,min = -163.04 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 18-#8  (As,pro = 91.21 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 183.53 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 200.74 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 197.26 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 205.28 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 158.66 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 169.18 (t)
Vp           = 169.18 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =    -103.77 T (COMB35 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     169.18 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.643 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.643 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.393 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50

Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 152.78 (t-m)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 150.78 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 167.51 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 119.36 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 133.46 (t)
Vp           = 133.46 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      55.67 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     133.46 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.508 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.508 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.495 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.495 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(143.25, 242.00, 517.50) = 143.25 cm

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 128.90 (t-m)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 182.41 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 163.05 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 185.81 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 174.82 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -348.90 T
Mu,maj = 25.21 T-M
Mu,min = -7.68 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -177.43 T
Mu,maj = -2.39 T-M
Mu,min = 185.81 T-M
As     = 85.21 cm2

As,req = 85.21 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 200.75 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 183.54 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 205.27 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 197.25 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 169.17 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 158.66 (t)
Vp           = 169.17 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     103.88 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     169.17 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.643 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.643 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.393 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50

Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 167.46 (t-m)

Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 133.45 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 119.36 (t)
Vp           = 133.45 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      73.94 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     133.45 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.508 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.508 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.495 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.495 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 87.95 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 62.41 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 102.89 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 77.50 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 97.06 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 71.74 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 114.16 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 89.13 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 88.01 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 67.03 (t)
Vp           = 88.01 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.25, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  9F GB1(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 11-#8 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 103.99 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 146.54 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.25, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  8F GB1(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 178.31 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 228.39 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 129.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 171.53 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 62.40 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 87.94 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 77.50 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 102.90 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -182.61 T
Mu,maj = -25.02 T-M
Mu,min = -12.55 T-M
As     = 72.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -81.07 T
Mu,maj = 10.53 T-M
Mu,min = -62.40 T-M
As     = 72.00 cm2

主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 71.74 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 97.05 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 89.14 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 114.18 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 67.03 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 88.01 (t)
Vp           = 88.01 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      24.12 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      88.01 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.380 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.282 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

             C2             LL1          Bottom            0.00            0.00           -0.05           -0.02            0.39
             C2             LL1             Top           -0.00            0.00            0.01           -0.02            0.39
             C2           LL500          Bottom           -0.06           -0.05            0.11            0.09           -0.10
             C2           LL500             Top            0.06           -0.05           -0.11            0.09           -0.10
             C2         SPX Max          Bottom           66.93           59.01            6.04            5.75           35.15

             C2     AutoSeq Max          Bottom            0.00            0.00            6.81            8.29            0.00

             C2     AutoSeq Min             Top            0.00           -4.26          -13.27            0.00         -153.63

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  8F GB7(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 7-#8 + 2.21(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 7-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 125.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 125.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 96.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 91.34 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(103.58, 127.00, 380.00) = 103.58 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (103.58 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.86 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.57 cm2)

  8F GB8(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 9-#8 + 2.57(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 143.30 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 160.35 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 103.95 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 122.76 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.67, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.67 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.67 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.31 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.21 cm2)

  7F GB7(55x80)

考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(103.58, 127.00, 380.00) = 103.58 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 160.54 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 116.50 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 122.84 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 123.68 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 131.90 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 131.89 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 132.42 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -216.05 T
Mu,maj = -9.12 T-M
Mu,min = 16.45 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -97.27 T
Mu,maj = 16.13 T-M
Mu,min = 131.89 T-M
As     = 81.49 cm2

As,req = 81.49 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 138.16 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 146.91 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 147.80 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 147.80 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 119.15 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 122.80 (t)
Vp           = 122.80 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -69.04 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     122.80 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.531 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.531 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.395 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(10) 柱設計及配筋完成
======================================================================================================================================================
(COL. LINE : C2)

| As=  81.5 <COMB76 Max-XB>       |                |   o 20-#8  [101.3]      |
|       1.27 %[C2]                |                |   o  0-#0               |

|            0.395<Mpr>[C2]       +----------------+         2-#4            |

======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 146.98 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 138.23 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 147.72 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 147.72 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 122.80 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 119.15 (t)
Vp           = 122.80 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      69.06 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     122.80 T
hc      =      70.73 cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  8F GB20(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 10-#8 + 2.52(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 177.64 (t-m)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 116.55 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 195.41 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 160.21 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 141.70 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 82.31 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 70.98 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 94.68 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.74 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -141.71 T
Mu,maj = 12.15 T-M
Mu,min = 6.65 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 33.63 T
Mu,maj = 94.68 T-M
Mu,min = 10.49 T-M
As     = 81.35 cm2

As,req = 81.35 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 72.60 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 63.89 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 78.97 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 70.57 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 63.15 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 56.03 (t)
Vp           = 63.15 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      38.41 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      63.15 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.273 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.350 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 63.40 (t)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.25, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)

  8F GB1(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 11-#8 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 11-#8

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 141.63 (t-m)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 182.04 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 193.49 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 201.54 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 212.82 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -399.71 T
Mu,maj = -22.35 T-M
Mu,min = -8.01 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -227.83 T
Mu,maj = -4.00 T-M
Mu,min = -212.82 T-M
As     = 95.42 cm2

As,req = 95.42 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 205.40 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 213.75 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 227.88 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 236.06 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 180.53 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 187.42 (t)
Vp           = 187.42 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =    -112.49 T (COMB35 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     187.42 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.713 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.713 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.434 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 152.67 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 177.18 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 185.57 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 137.44 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 147.99 (t)
Vp           = 147.99 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 193.58 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 182.12 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 212.71 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 201.44 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -396.28 T
Mu,maj = 22.49 T-M
Mu,min = -7.82 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -203.92 T
Mu,maj = -3.15 T-M
Mu,min = 212.71 T-M
As     = 100.47 cm2

As,req = 100.47 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 213.85 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 205.49 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 235.94 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 227.77 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 187.41 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 180.53 (t)
Vp           = 187.41 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     112.58 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     187.41 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.713 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.713 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.434 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.25, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 104.76 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 78.91 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 115.60 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.56 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -233.50 T
Mu,maj = 23.44 T-M
Mu,min = -14.11 T-M
As     = 72.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -33.92 T
Mu,maj = 9.67 T-M
Mu,min = 115.60 T-M
As     = 80.20 cm2

As,req = 80.20 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 116.24 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 90.75 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 128.59 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.16 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 102.01 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 77.88 (t)
Vp           = 102.01 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      61.52 T (COMB36 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     102.01 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.441 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.335 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.25, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  8F GB1(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 178.31 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 228.39 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 129.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 171.53 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(96.25, 127.00, 380.00) = 96.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (96.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  7F GB1(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 15-#8 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 11-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 195.83 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 261.88 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 141.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 196.19 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 78.89 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 104.74 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 83.58 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 115.62 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -234.90 T
Mu,maj = -23.60 T-M
Mu,min = -14.17 T-M
As     = 72.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -94.60 T
Mu,maj = 14.82 T-M
Mu,min = -78.89 T-M
As     = 72.00 cm2

As,req = 72.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 90.74 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 116.22 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 96.17 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 128.61 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 77.88 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 102.01 (t)
Vp           = 102.01 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      31.51 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     102.01 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.441 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.335 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 155.92 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 155.92 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 156.33 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 164.57 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 130.11 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 133.54 (t)
Vp           = 133.54 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -76.24 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     133.54 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.577 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.577 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.426 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.426 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 166.44 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 166.47 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 180.69 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 180.72 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -256.89 T
Mu,maj = -23.11 T-M
Mu,min = -6.33 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -137.55 T
Mu,maj = 180.72 T-M
Mu,min = -12.52 T-M
As     = 116.99 cm2

As,req = 116.99 cm2
主筋: 24-#8  (As,pro = 121.61 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 80.64 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 105.86 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 80.29 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 113.56 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 67.05 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 91.43 (t)
Vp           = 91.43 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      27.44 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      91.43 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.395 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.703 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.703 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 169.82 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 177.32 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 183.23 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 190.67 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -382.42 T
Mu,maj = -18.82 T-M
Mu,min = 1.26 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -200.64 T
Mu,maj = 190.67 T-M
Mu,min = -10.20 T-M
As     = 85.26 cm2

As,req = 85.26 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 178.80 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 187.26 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 185.83 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 202.53 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 151.93 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 162.41 (t)
Vp           = 162.41 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -97.12 T (COMB6 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     162.41 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.399 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.426 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 169.85 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 177.36 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 183.20 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 190.63 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -387.78 T
Mu,maj = 19.16 T-M
Mu,min = 1.23 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -203.60 T
Mu,maj = 190.63 T-M
Mu,min = 10.39 T-M
As     = 84.59 cm2

As,req = 84.59 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 195.76 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 178.90 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 193.88 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 177.18 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 162.35 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 148.37 (t)
Vp           = 162.35 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      95.66 T (COMB36 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     162.35 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.398 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.426 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 166.65 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 166.68 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 180.46 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 180.49 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -255.61 T
Mu,maj = 22.71 T-M
Mu,min = -6.28 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -136.86 T
Mu,maj = 180.49 T-M
Mu,min = 12.30 T-M
As     = 116.90 cm2

As,req = 116.90 cm2
主筋: 24-#8  (As,pro = 121.61 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 106.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 80.74 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 113.42 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 80.19 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 91.42 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 67.05 (t)
Vp           = 91.42 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      56.31 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      91.42 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.395 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.703 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.703 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

                          Pu(T)      Mumaj(T-m)        Vumaj(T)      Mumin(T-m)        Vumin(T)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Top           89.90           10.78           -8.63           59.40          -47.83
         Bottom           86.74          -10.01           -8.63          -56.82          -47.83
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As,req = 68.18 cm2

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  6F GB11(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 2.52(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 12-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 229.43 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 212.75 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 172.73 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 154.26 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)


Y 方向 柱底
  5F GB11(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 2.52(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 12-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 229.43 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 212.75 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 172.73 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 154.26 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.55
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 113.62 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 101.47 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 102.68 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 91.70 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB58 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 89.90 T
Mu,maj = 10.78 T-M
Mu,min = 59.40 T-M
As     = 68.18 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = 75.46 T
Mu,maj = 113.62 T-M
Mu,min = 11.31 T-M
As     = 107.48 cm2

As,req = 107.48 cm2
主筋: 24-#8  (As,pro = 121.61 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.55
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 88.08 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 97.37 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 79.66 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.38 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 69.89 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 80.73 (t)
Vp           = 80.73 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      33.72 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      80.73 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.349 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.431 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.431 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

As     = 98.10 cm2

主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 166.25 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 166.30 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 163.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 154.83 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 137.19 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 133.81 (t)
Vp           = 137.19 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      81.23 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     137.19 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.593 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.593 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.457 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.457 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 229.72 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 241.28 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 237.75 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 250.87 (t-m)

Mu,min = -8.07 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

Mu,min = -250.87 T-M

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 260.16 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 268.54 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 269.49 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 279.78 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 220.69 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 228.47 (t)
Vp           = 228.47 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50

Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 159.16 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 169.65 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)

Vu(max) =     -97.10 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     169.65 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.420 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.448 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 241.33 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 229.77 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 250.82 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 237.70 (t-m)

Mu,min = -7.73 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)

Mu,min = 250.82 T-M

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 268.60 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 260.22 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 279.72 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 269.43 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 228.47 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 220.69 (t)
Vp           = 228.47 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

hc      =      80.73 cm

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      95.70 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     166.02 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.406 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.447 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 143.30 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 110.08 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 145.54 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 113.54 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 160.26 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 126.65 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 162.94 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 130.65 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 134.67 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 107.21 (t)
Vp           = 134.67 (t)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.25, 137.00, 390.00) = 106.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (106.25 - 65) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  6F GB1(65x80)
  B   = 65cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 18-#8 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 14-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 248.76 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 314.79 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 180.18 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 234.56 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.25, 137.00, 390.00) = 106.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (106.25 - 65) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  5F GB1(65x80)
  B   = 65cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 19-#8 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 15-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 266.15 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 331.93 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 192.74 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 247.06 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 110.11 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 143.34 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 113.51 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 145.50 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -339.01 T
Mu,maj = -25.11 T-M
Mu,min = -13.05 T-M
As     = 72.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 3.15 T
Mu,maj = -10.27 T-M
Mu,min = 113.51 T-M
As     = 87.89 cm2

As,req = 87.89 cm2
主筋: 18-#8  (As,pro = 91.21 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 126.68 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 160.30 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 130.62 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 162.89 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 107.21 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 134.67 (t)
Vp           = 134.67 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      48.05 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     134.67 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.582 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.582 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.404 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
