                          Pu(T)      Mumaj(T-m)        Vumaj(T)      Mumin(T-m)        Vumin(T)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Top           46.47           12.85            3.70           49.69           60.47
         Bottom           43.31            4.69            3.70           76.93           60.47
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As,req = 69.63 cm2

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(141.25, 247.00, 676.50) = 141.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (141.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.85 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.57 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  5F GB13(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 15-#8 + 4.57(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 12-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 262.70 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 213.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 202.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 154.40 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(141.25, 247.00, 676.50) = 141.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (141.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.85 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.57 cm2)


Y 方向 柱底
  4F GB13(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 16-#8 + 4.57(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 281.88 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 231.64 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 216.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 167.85 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 124.33 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 94.92 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 133.08 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 103.38 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB80 Max 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 43.31 T
Mu,maj = 4.69 T-M
Mu,min = 76.93 T-M
As     = 69.63 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 43.31 T
Mu,maj = 133.08 T-M
Mu,min = 4.69 T-M
As     = 115.42 cm2

As,req = 115.42 cm2
主筋: 18-#10  (As,pro = 146.57 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 164.57 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 173.25 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 183.89 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 192.66 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 145.19 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 152.46 (t)
Vp           = 152.46 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -85.24 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     152.46 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.662 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.662 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.505 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.505 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

As     = 116.03 cm2

As,req = 116.03 cm2
主筋: 16-#10  (As,pro = 130.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 98.29 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 81.24 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 111.09 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 93.36 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 87.24 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 72.75 (t)
Vp           = 87.24 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      47.68 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      87.24 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.379 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.444 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.444 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

主筋: 26-#10  (As,pro = 211.72 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 274.51 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 285.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 291.86 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 302.48 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 235.99 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 244.78 (t)
Vp           = 244.78 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =    -134.91 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     244.78 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.935 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.935 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.520 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.520 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

As,req = 150.17 cm2
主筋: 24-#10  (As,pro = 195.43 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 284.58 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 274.10 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 294.29 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 283.66 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 241.19 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 232.40 (t)
Vp           = 241.19 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     134.94 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     241.19 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.921 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.921 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.520 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.520 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(minor)

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 203.02 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 203.06 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 199.01 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 214.07 (t-m)

Mu,maj = 70.91 T-M
Mu,min = 48.69 T-M
As     = 67.41 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -361.96 T
Mu,maj = 214.07 T-M
Mu,min = 22.20 T-M
As     = 158.40 cm2

主筋: 22-#10  (As,pro = 179.15 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 126.66 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 92.31 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 133.12 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 99.23 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 108.24 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 79.81 (t)
Vp           = 108.24 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

Vp      =     108.24 T
hc      =      70.73 cm

Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.470 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  4F GB11(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm

  ASB = 13-#8

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 186.34 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 167.75 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)


Y 方向 柱底
  3F GB11(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 2.52(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 248.22 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 231.36 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 186.34 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 167.75 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 106.60 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 95.97 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.56
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 125.34 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 112.84 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB58 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 145.59 T
Mu,maj = -10.06 T-M
Mu,min = -72.44 T-M
As     = 92.56 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 127.29 T
Mu,maj = 125.34 T-M
Mu,min = -0.24 T-M
As     = 129.78 cm2

As,req = 129.78 cm2
主筋: 16-#10  (As,pro = 130.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 85.47 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 101.71 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.56
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 100.49 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 119.58 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 77.48 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 92.20 (t)
Vp           = 92.20 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      40.23 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      92.20 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.400 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.466 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(141.25, 247.00, 676.50) = 141.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (141.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.85 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.57 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  4F GB18(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 16-#8 + 4.57(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 281.88 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 231.64 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 216.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 167.85 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(141.25, 247.00, 676.50) = 141.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (141.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.85 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.57 cm2)


Y 方向 柱底
  3F GB18(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 16-#8 + 4.57(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 281.88 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 231.64 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 216.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 167.85 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 126.27 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 98.10 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.54
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 140.80 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 109.38 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB80 Max 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 68.64 T
Mu,maj = 14.00 T-M
Mu,min = 81.69 T-M
As     = 79.72 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 68.64 T
Mu,maj = 140.80 T-M
Mu,min = 14.00 T-M
As     = 127.49 cm2

As,req = 127.49 cm2
主筋: 18-#10  (As,pro = 146.57 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 182.81 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 174.49 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.54
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 203.84 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 194.56 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 161.10 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 153.77 (t)
Vp           = 161.10 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      90.32 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     161.10 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.699 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.699 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.525 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 155.18 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 186.21 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 195.75 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 210.56 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 207.12 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 214.71 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 45.76 T
Mu,maj = 72.22 T-M
Mu,min = 59.42 T-M
As     = 76.36 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -221.57 T
Mu,maj = 214.71 T-M
Mu,min = -12.10 T-M
As     = 126.99 cm2

As,req = 126.99 cm2
主筋: 20-#10  (As,pro = 162.86 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 97.60 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 130.94 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 99.51 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 133.50 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 82.13 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 110.18 (t)
Vp           = 110.18 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      35.31 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     110.18 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.478 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.868 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.868 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

  ASB = 11-#9
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 249.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 249.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 180.84 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 191.72 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 196.72 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 196.78 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 235.00 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 227.27 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -545.63 T
Mu,maj = -22.50 T-M
Mu,min = 2.17 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -290.89 T
Mu,maj = 235.00 T-M
Mu,min = -11.93 T-M
As     = 95.96 cm2

As,req = 95.96 cm2
主筋: 16-#10  (As,pro = 130.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 202.46 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 218.51 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 216.27 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 234.13 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 174.47 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 188.60 (t)
Vp           = 188.60 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =    -110.24 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     188.60 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.455 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.500 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 142.60 (t-m)

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(123.75, 247.00, 620.00) = 123.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (123.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.46 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.64 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  3F GB6(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 3.64(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 231.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 231.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 167.71 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 176.64 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 194.99 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 178.98 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 213.87 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 196.77 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -556.43 T
Mu,maj = 21.62 T-M
Mu,min = 0.92 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -553.59 T
Mu,maj = -2.51 T-M
Mu,min = -194.99 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#10  (As,pro = 130.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 216.15 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 199.66 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 237.19 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 219.77 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 188.89 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 174.76 (t)
Vp           = 188.89 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     106.08 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     188.89 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.456 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.470 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

Mu,maj = 72.66 T-M
Mu,min = 51.00 T-M
As     = 72.50 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -217.38 T
Mu,maj = 210.61 T-M
Mu,min = -13.01 T-M
As     = 123.91 cm2

As,req = 123.91 cm2
主筋: 20-#10  (As,pro = 162.86 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 130.98 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 97.63 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 130.49 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 97.27 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 108.94 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 81.21 (t)
Vp           = 108.94 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      65.64 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     108.94 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.473 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.843 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.843 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(138.75, 247.00, 676.50) = 138.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (138.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.65 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.44 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  3F GB13(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 13-#9 + 4.44(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#9
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 291.63 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 227.67 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 223.00 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 164.91 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(137.50, 247.00, 676.50) = 137.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (137.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.55 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.37 cm2)


Y 方向 柱底
  2F GB13(55x80)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 16-#8 + 4.37(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 12-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 281.27 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 214.31 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 215.31 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 155.24 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.46
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 123.57 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 91.38 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.64
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 165.32 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 119.19 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB80 Max 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 93.70 T
Mu,maj = 6.87 T-M
Mu,min = 89.15 T-M
As     = 92.03 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 93.70 T
Mu,maj = 165.32 T-M
Mu,min = 6.87 T-M
As     = 153.54 cm2

As,req = 153.54 cm2
主筋: 20-#10  (As,pro = 162.86 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.46
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 173.39 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 173.39 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.64
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 229.14 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 240.10 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 167.72 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 172.29 (t)
Vp           = 172.29 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -93.16 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     172.29 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.748 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.748 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.569 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.569 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(102.50, 127.00, 345.00) = 102.50 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (102.50 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.77 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.52 cm2)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 167.71 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.45
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 100.06 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 90.08 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.62
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 129.80 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 125.27 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB54 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 180.21 T
Mu,maj = 9.57 T-M
Mu,min = -71.06 T-M
As     = 100.65 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 180.21 T
Mu,maj = 125.27 T-M
Mu,min = 9.57 T-M
As     = 143.72 cm2

As,req = 143.72 cm2
主筋: 20-#10  (As,pro = 162.86 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.45
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 87.83 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 80.19 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.62
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 132.96 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 122.37 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 92.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 84.40 (t)
Vp           = 92.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      47.43 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      92.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.399 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.461 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 12 Ash / S = 0.53 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.25, 137.00, 227.50) = 106.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

X 方向 柱頂
  3F GB1(65x80)
  B   = 65cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 15-#9 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 15-#9
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 338.78 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 338.78 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 251.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 245.77 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(143.25, 242.00, 355.00) = 143.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (143.25 - 50) / 25 * 1.99 = 7.41 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.94 cm2)

  ASB = 9-#10

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 217.67 (t-m)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (105.83 - 65) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.24 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.16 cm2)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 251.33 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 266.57 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 261.45 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 273.42 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -637.18 T
Mu,maj = -28.86 T-M
Mu,min = -12.13 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -651.61 T
Mu,maj = -16.25 T-M
Mu,min = -273.42 T-M
As     = 137.13 cm2

As,req = 137.13 cm2
主筋: 24-#10  (As,pro = 195.43 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 285.28 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 298.09 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 296.59 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 305.32 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 242.45 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 251.42 (t)
Vp           = 251.42 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =    -156.08 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     251.42 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.960 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.960 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.535 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(143.25, 242.00, 355.00) = 143.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (143.25 - 50) / 25 * 1.99 = 7.41 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.94 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  3F GB2(50x80)
  B   = 50cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 10-#10 + 4.94(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#10
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 283.10 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 256.38 (t-m)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 185.83 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.25, 137.00, 390.00) = 106.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (106.25 - 65) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 265.09 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 249.93 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 274.82 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 262.79 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -632.87 T
Mu,maj = 27.71 T-M
Mu,min = -11.30 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -628.50 T
Mu,maj = -12.69 T-M
Mu,min = 274.82 T-M
As     = 131.28 cm2

As,req = 131.28 cm2
主筋: 24-#10  (As,pro = 195.43 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 296.43 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 283.70 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 306.88 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 298.11 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 251.38 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 242.42 (t)
Vp           = 251.38 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     155.43 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     251.38 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.960 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.960 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.508 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.25, 137.00, 390.00) = 106.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (106.25 - 65) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.28 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.18 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  3F GB3(65x80)
  B   = 65cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 17-#9 + 2.18(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#9
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 380.08 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 295.41 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 282.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 213.91 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(105.83, 137.00, 390.00) = 105.83 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (105.83 - 65) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.24 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.16 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  2F GB3(65x80)
  B   = 65cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 17-#9 + 2.16(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#9

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 295.41 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 282.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 213.93 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 167.07 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 126.67 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 172.41 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 130.76 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 66.69 T
Mu,maj = 98.56 T-M
Mu,min = 19.82 T-M
As     = 92.30 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 66.69 T
Mu,maj = 19.82 T-M
Mu,min = 172.41 T-M
As     = 152.35 cm2

As,req = 152.35 cm2
主筋: 20-#10  (As,pro = 162.86 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 187.56 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 145.78 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 193.60 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 150.47 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 158.82 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 123.44 (t)
Vp           = 158.82 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      88.66 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     158.82 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.690 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.690 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.423 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 126.67 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 167.07 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 130.77 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 172.43 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Pu     = 68.02 T
Mu,maj = 100.09 T-M
Mu,min = 35.32 T-M
As     = 95.71 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = 82.53 T
Mu,maj = -9.03 T-M
Mu,min = 130.77 T-M
As     = 121.72 cm2

As,req = 121.72 cm2
主筋: 18-#10  (As,pro = 146.57 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 145.78 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 187.56 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 150.48 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 193.62 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 240 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 123.44 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 158.83 (t)
Vp           = 158.83 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      54.91 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     158.83 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.690 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.690 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.436 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(140.00, 247.00, 676.50) = 140.00 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (140.00 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.75 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.50 cm2)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 155.20 (t-m)

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(140.00, 247.00, 676.50) = 140.00 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (140.00 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 6.75 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.50 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 86.40 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 65.93 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 132.85 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 126.78 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 290.31 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 290.31 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 340 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 124.46 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 122.67 (t)
Vp           = 124.46 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      84.01 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     124.46 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.540 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.530 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.478 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(126.25, 247.00, 705.00) = 126.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (126.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.66 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.77 cm2)

版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.46
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 78.84 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 111.32 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB35 Min 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -893.97 T
Mu,maj = -167.41 T-M
Mu,min = -116.70 T-M
As     = 173.94 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = 76.25 T
Mu,maj = 50.93 T-M
Mu,min = 78.84 T-M
As     = 83.25 cm2

As,req = 173.94 cm2
主筋: 22-#10  (As,pro = 179.15 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.46
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 90.69 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 121.67 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 305.17 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 305.17 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 340 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 116.43 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 125.54 (t)
Vp           = 125.54 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      50.52 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     125.54 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.545 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(126.25, 247.00, 542.50) = 126.25 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (126.25 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.66 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.77 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.54
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 175.15 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 193.08 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -667.16 T
Mu,maj = -12.75 T-M
Mu,min = -6.85 T-M
As     = 77.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -661.32 T
Mu,maj = -13.63 T-M
Mu,min = -193.08 T-M
As     = 126.64 cm2

As,req = 126.64 cm2
主筋: 16-#10  (As,pro = 130.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.54
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 194.27 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 212.82 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 234.22 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 234.22 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 340 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 126.03 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 131.48 (t)
Vp           = 131.48 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -72.41 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     131.48 T
hc      =      60.73 cm
Ag      =    7700.00 cm2
Ac      =    6324.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.755 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.317 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.455 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.322 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 231.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 167.71 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 176.64 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(145.75, 247.00, 542.50) = 145.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (145.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 7.21 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.81 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  1F GB5(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 4-#8 + 4.81(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 3-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 63.53 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 48.46 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 56.63 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 35.50 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(123.75, 247.00, 542.50) = 123.75 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (123.75 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 5.46 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 3.64 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.56
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 223.15 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 204.60 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

======================================================================================================================================================

Pu     = -681.23 T
Mu,maj = 14.33 T-M
Mu,min = -4.34 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -639.53 T
Mu,maj = -7.04 T-M
Mu,min = -223.15 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

主筋: 16-#10  (As,pro = 130.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.56
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 247.14 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 228.20 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 312.82 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 312.82 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 340 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 164.69 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 159.12 (t)
Vp           = 164.69 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      92.43 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     164.69 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.349 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.339 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      71.44 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     129.53 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    7200.00 cm2
Ac      =    5904.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.605 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.562 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.614 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
Avh / S =      0.614 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(3) 柱主筋彈性設計結果
======================================================================================================================================================
由 COMB35 Min 載重組合控制
                          Pu(T)      Mumaj(T-m)        Vumaj(T)      Mumin(T-m)        Vumin(T)

As,req = 285.68 cm2

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(105.83, 137.00, 390.00) = 105.83 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (105.83 - 65) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.24 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.16 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  2F GB1(65x80)
  B   = 65cm
  D   = 80cm
  AST = 17-#9 + 2.16(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 13-#9
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 295.41 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 380.08 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 213.93 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 282.07 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(95.83, 127.00, 380.00) = 95.83 cm
版配筋 #5@25(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (95.83 - 55) / 25 * 1.99 = 3.24 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.16 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  1F GB1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 6-#8 + 2.16(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 3-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 48.48 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 93.27 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 35.56 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 72.54 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 125.94 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 166.06 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB35 Min 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -947.67 T
Mu,maj = -280.13 T-M
Mu,min = -116.56 T-M
As     = 285.68 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = 119.63 T
Mu,maj = 5.76 T-M
Mu,min = -125.94 T-M
As     = 114.97 cm2

As,req = 285.68 cm2
主筋: 36-#10  (As,pro = 293.15 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 144.93 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 186.47 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 505.80 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 505.80 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 340 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 191.39 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 203.61 (t)
Vp           = 203.61 (t)

======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      90.45 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     203.61 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.778 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制
